Question
========

You buy 15 lottery tickets for €1 each. With each lottery ticket you have a chance of 0.06 to win €10. If you take into account the cost of the lottery tickets, what is the standard deviation of your profit?

Answerlist
----------

* € 10
* € 9
* € 9,20
* € 6

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* € 10: Incorrect
* 9 €: Incorrect
* € 9,20: Correct
* € 6: Incorrect
